languages.text:
Однако в глазах ее застыла упрямая решимость:
"Я знаю, кто ты, Тисифона Орселлио. И знаю, чего ты хочешь... Узрела в видениях, что ты посылала мне вновь и вновь. Я не позволю... Никогда не позволю тебе стать мной..."
Голос Кассии дрожал от усталости, но она и не думала уступать в этой битве.

traits.locale_text:
Однако в глазах ее застыла упрямая решимость:
"Я знаю, кто ты, Тисифона Орселлио. И знаю, чего ты хочешь... Узрила в видениях, что ты посылала мне вновь и вновь. Я не позволю тебе... Никогда не позволю тебе стать мной..."
Голос Кассии дрожит от усталости, ноги подкашиваются, но она и не думает уступать в этой битве душ — воля Леди-Навигатора крепка как никогда.

languages.text:
Yet, there was steadfast resolve in her eyes.
"I know who you are, Tisiphone Orsellio. I know what you crave... I saw it in the visions that you sent me again and again. I won't allow you... I will never allow you to become me..."
Cassia's fatigued voice quivered, but she was not about to yield in this battle.
languages.original_text:
Однако в глазах ее застыла упрямая решимость:
"Я знаю, кто ты, Тисифона Орселлио. И знаю, чего ты хочешь... Узрела в видениях, что ты посылала мне вновь и вновь. Я не позволю... Никогда не позволю тебе стать мной..."
Голос Кассии дрожал от усталости, но она и не думала уступать в этой битве.

Cassia's voice quivered with fatigue, but she was not about to yield in this battle.

Cassia's voice quivered with fatigue, but she was not about to yield in this battle.

"I know who you are, Tisiphone Orsellio. I know what you crave... I saw it in the visions that you sent me again and again. I won't allow you... I will never allow you to become me..."
Cassia's fatigued voice quivered, but she was not about to yield in this battle.

Yet, there was steadfast resolve in her eyes.
"I know who you are, Tisiphone Orsellio. I know what you crave... I saw it in the visions that you sent me again and again. I won't allow you... I will never allow you to become me..."
Cassia's fatigued voice quivered, but she was not about to yield in this battle.

languages.text:
しかし、カシアの目には揺るがぬ決意が宿っていた。
「知っているわ、ティシフォン・オーセリオ。あなたが欲しくてたまらないものも…あなたから繰り返し送られたビジョンを見たから。そうはさせない…あなたがあたくしになるなど、決してさせない…」
カシアの疲れ切った声は震えていたが、この戦いで一歩も引くつもりはなかった。
languages.original_text:
Yet, there was steadfast resolve in her eyes.
"I know who you are, Tisiphone Orsellio. I know what you crave... I saw it in the visions that you sent me again and again. I won't allow you... I will never allow you to become me..."
Cassia's fatigued voice quivered, but she was not about to yield in this battle.

traits.locale_text:
しかし、カシアの目には揺るがぬ決意が宿っていた。
「知っているわ、ティシフォン・オーセリオ。あなたが欲しくてたまらないものも…あなたから繰り返し送られたビジョンを見たから。そうはさせない…あなたがあたくしになるなど、決してさせない…」
カシアの疲れ切った声は震えていたが、この戦いで一歩も引くつもりはなかった。

languages.text:
但即便如此，她的目光中却充满了坚定的决心。
“我知道你是谁，提西福涅·奥赛罗，我知道你渴望什么……在你的幻象里，我一遍又一遍地看到了那些景象，但我不允许你……我绝对不允许你变成我……”
卡西娅疲惫的声音颤抖着，但她绝不打算在这场战斗中屈服。
languages.original_text:
Yet, there was steadfast resolve in her eyes.
"I know who you are, Tisiphone Orsellio. I know what you crave... I saw it in the visions that you sent me again and again. I won't allow you... I will never allow you to become me..."
Cassia's fatigued voice quivered, but she was not about to yield in this battle.

traits.locale_text:
但即便如此，她的目光中却充满了坚定的决心。
“我知道你是谁，提西福涅·奥塞罗，我知道你渴望什么……在你的幻象里，我一遍又一遍地看到了那些景象，但我不允许你……我绝对不允许你变成我……”
卡西娅疲惫的声音颤抖着，但她绝不打算在这场战斗中屈服。

languages.text:
Malgré tout, elle semblait animée par une détermination sans faille.
« Je sais qui vous êtes, Tisiphone Orsellio. Je sais ce que vous désirez si ardemment... Je l'ai vu dans les visions que vous n'avez cessé de m'envoyer, encore et encore. Je ne vous le permettrai pas... Jamais je ne vous laisserai devenir moi... »
La voix tremblante de Cassia laissait deviner son épuisement, mais également qu'elle n'avait aucune intention de perdre cette bataille.
languages.original_text:
Yet, there was steadfast resolve in her eyes.
"I know who you are, Tisiphone Orsellio. I know what you crave... I saw it in the visions that you sent me again and again. I won't allow you... I will never allow you to become me..."
Cassia's fatigued voice quivered, but she was not about to yield in this battle.

traits.locale_text:
Malgré tout, elle semblait animée par une détermination sans faille.
« Je sais qui vous êtes, Tisiphone Orsellio. Je sais ce que vous désirez si ardemment... Je l'ai vu dans les visions que vous n'avez cessé de m'envoyer, encore et encore. Je ne vous le permettrai pas. Jamais je ne vous laisserai devenir moi... »
La voix tremblante de Cassia laissait deviner son épuisement, mais également qu'elle n'avait aucune intention de perdre cette bataille.

languages.text:
Y pese a todo, había una firme determinación en su mirada.
«Sé quién eres, Tisiphone Orsellio. Sé lo que buscas... lo he visto en las visiones que no parabas de enviarme. Pero no te lo permitiré... Jamás dejaré que te conviertas en mí...».
La voz de Cassia tembló por la fatiga, pero no tenía ninguna intención de claudicar.
languages.original_text:
Yet, there was steadfast resolve in her eyes.
"I know who you are, Tisiphone Orsellio. I know what you crave... I saw it in the visions that you sent me again and again. I won't allow you... I will never allow you to become me..."
Cassia's fatigued voice quivered, but she was not about to yield in this battle.

traits.locale_text:
Y pese a todo, había una firme determinación en su mirada.
«Sé quién eres, Tisiphone Orsellio. Sé lo que buscas... lo he visto en las visiones que no parabas de enviarme. Pero no te lo permitiré... Jamás dejaré que te conviertas en mí...».
La voz de Cassia tembló por la fatiga, pero no tenía ninguna intención de claudicar.

languages.text:
Doch in ihren Augen lag standhafte Entschlossenheit.
"Ich weiß, wer Ihr seid, Tisiphone Orsellio. Ich weiß, wonach Ihr Euch verzehrt ... Ich habe es in den Visionen gesehen, die Ihr mir wieder und wieder geschickt habt. Ich gestatte Euch nicht ... Ich gestatte Euch niemals, ich zu werden ..."
Cassias erschöpfte Stimme zitterte, doch sie hatte nicht vor, diese Schlacht zu verlieren.
languages.original_text:
Yet, there was steadfast resolve in her eyes.
"I know who you are, Tisiphone Orsellio. I know what you crave... I saw it in the visions that you sent me again and again. I won't allow you... I will never allow you to become me..."
Cassia's fatigued voice quivered, but she was not about to yield in this battle.

traits.locale_text:
Doch in ihren Augen lag standhafte Entschlossenheit.
"Ich weiß, wer Ihr seid, Tisiphone Orsellio. Ich weiß, wonach Ihr Euch verzehrt ... Ich habe es in den Visionen gesehen, die Ihr mir wieder und wieder geschickt habt. Ich gestatte Euch nicht ... Ich gestatte Euch niemals, ich zu werden ..."
Cassias erschöpfte Stimme zitterte, doch sie hatte nicht vor, diese Schlacht zu verlieren.

languages.text:
Buna rağmen gözlerinden azimli bir kararlılık okunuyordu.
"Ne olduğunu biliyorum Tisiphone Orsellio. Ne için yanıp tutuştuğunu biliyorum. Bana defalarca gönderdiğin görülerde gördüm. Sana müsaade etmeyeceğim. Yerimi almana müsaade etmeyeceğim."
Cassia'nın yorgun sesi titrese de bu savaşta pes etmeye niyeti yoktu.
languages.original_text:
Yet, there was steadfast resolve in her eyes.
"I know who you are, Tisiphone Orsellio. I know what you crave... I saw it in the visions that you sent me again and again. I won't allow you... I will never allow you to become me..."
Cassia's fatigued voice quivered, but she was not about to yield in this battle.

traits.locale_text:
Ancak gözlerinden azimli bir kararlılık okunuyordu.
"Ne olduğunu biliyorum Tisiphone Orsellio. Ne için yanıp tutuştuğunu biliyorum... Bana defalarca gönderdiğin görülerde gördüm. Sana müsaade etmeyeceğim... Benim yerimi almana müsaade etmeyeceğim.."
Cassia'nın yorgun sesi titrese de bu savaşta pes edecek değildi.
